Reviews.Title: I like IT
Reviews.Author: Ebony "hardshelly"
Reviews.Content: I must say that I am super happy with these sellers.  I ordered this phone and received it the next day.  I am quite pleased.  The phone is not as elegant looking as the purple one but it is nice. Can't complain.  I just wish though that some of the features of the E63 were  added to this one.  Other than that, it is reasonably priced and works well for me.

Reviews.Title: Iam very dissappointed
Reviews.Author: mary
Reviews.Content: I brought the product to latin America and ,it has been impossible to connect to the internet,there is no way,no wifi,no,nothing.So I am very dissappointed and feel that it was a waste of money,never again will I buy anything

Reviews.Title: Great Phone
Reviews.Author: Starlight
Reviews.Content: What a little gem! Love it, love it, love it. This phone works with my AT&T; Go Phone plan. Had to get used to all the bells and whistles on this phone as my previous very old Nokia was quite outdated. The best best best part...it only needs charging once a week!! The instruction booklet does not have English as a primary language, so it takes a little time to understand what you are doing.It is worth it.

Reviews.Title: great!
Reviews.Author: Leetlemama
Reviews.Content: Purchased for my daughter, this phone has worked great for her!  She uses it for phone service but also as a mp3 player.  Battery lasts a long time before needing charging (3 days).  Has nice options.  I think the only "con" to this phone is the unavailability to block certain phone numbers.  That would be a nice feature.Would definitely purchase again!

Reviews.Title: good quality.but language only english and spanish
Reviews.Author: Jin
Reviews.Content: nokia always got good quality.sound is loud,and battery life for standby can last for 2weeks !but language of system only english and spanish

Reviews.Title: Excellent article
Reviews.Author: Alexander Gonzalez
Reviews.Content: An article of top quality and utility... An article of top quality and utility... and easy to use with quality materials for life and 100% recommended ...

Reviews.Title: Quite Pleased thus far ...
Reviews.Author: N.Nolte
Reviews.Content: Nokia was my first brand phone, then Samsung -- and as soon as I could, switched back to Nokia.I use this phone, get this: to make phone calls.and for texting.and sometimes photos.using the calendar to remind myself of upcoming mtgs/appts.that's it.no checking emails, browsing, etc. For me, the phone is to make phone-calls , and not to cook my dinner, wash my laundry, sprinkle the lawn ...The battery holds very well. No complaints (those are reserved for At&T;, sigh ...)All features are easy to handle - in my experience. Would buy it again. But hope this will last for a while...

Reviews.Title: sucks!!
Reviews.Author: Goran Savovski
Reviews.Content: this phone really really sucks. I can't even tell you how difficult it made my life. I had to put the phone on speaker so that I could hear people. The software is really sucky and it makes everything from calendar to alarm to phonebook hard to do.
